page.title: 09Mayor's Inauguration
page.content: The Mayor of Cowbridge's inaugaration held in the Council Chamber,Town Hall, Cowbridge Tuesday 21st May, 1985. {Present: }The Mayor(councillor J.G. Roberts), councillors D.S. Borthwick, W.S. Davies, Mrs.K. Gates, B.A. Gibbon, S.T. Golden, Mrs.J. Hydon, D.M. Jones, J.L. Jones, D.A.J. Rees and Mrs.D.A. Thomas. {In Attendance:}Mrs.M. Frost(Town Clerk), Mr.J.H. Williams(Treasurer), Rev.G.E. Williams(Mayor's Chaplain), Mace-Bearers, Sir Cennydd Traherne,Air Commodore & Mrs.J. Marshall, Mayor & Mayoress of Vale of Glamorgan Borough Council, Councillor & Mrs.J.Griffiths, Chairman & Lady of the County of South Glamorgan - Councillor & Mrs.K. Hutchings, Chief Superintendent & Mrs.B. Jenkins, County Councillor R.G. Thomas, Headteachers from Cowbridge Comprehensive School and Y Bont Faen.
